objective: Find implementation entrypoints and call chain across multiple files without reading the whole repo into master; produce symbol/line evidence.

inputs.hint: project source directory (scan selectively; do not dump contents)

questions: Where is the main entrypoint for the feature (route/handler/command) and how is it wired?
What is the minimal call chain (3-8 hops) from entrypoint to core logic?
Which config/settings files affect this feature?

must_cover.value: Prefer symbol_range evidence for call chain nodes; fall back to line_range.
